data.title: SDG@3 Workshop: Goal 6: Clean Water and Sanitation
data.meta_description: Learn about a different United Nations sustainable development goal during each session of the Office of Global Engagement's fall workshop series. The SDGs offer ways for the world to better the lives of everyone on the planet. The workshop series will focus on "Quality of Life" and feature a faculty member, student group representative and practitioner from the community briefly sharing what they are doing to make a difference. Each session will include time for table discussion and conclude with ways you can connect., powered by Localist, the Community Event Platform
data.text: Learn about a different United Nations sustainable development goal during each session of the Office of Global Engagement's fall workshop series. The SDGs offer ways for the world to better the lives of everyone on the planet. The workshop series will focus on "Quality of Life" and feature a faculty member, student group representative and practitioner from the community briefly sharing what they are doing to make a difference. Each session will include time for table discussion and conclude with ways you can connect.
